name: The Path of Greatest Resistance (for HTC Vive)
name_original: The Path of Greatest Resistance (for HTC Vive)
description:
The above trailer is for an experimental "jogging" mode, but there is also a seated mode.


Backstory

We were always doomed, I guess. It's in people's nature to take the easy way out.

My grandpa told me the 2020's were a bloodbath. When machine learning got into people's hands, it was just too tempting. Why slave away to make a living, when you can download an AI, give it some instructions, and release it to do your bidding? Maybe it will make you a million dollars. Maybe it will kill a million people.

People knew the risk but they did it anyway. People always seem to take the path of least resistance.

It was a short time before mankind was wiped off the Earth. But some of my ancestors fled the planet. Now, the last of humanity hides among the rocky debris in the outskirts of our solar system.

We were safe for decades. But now they're here. The Machine Alliance has found us. Most of my colony wants to run away and hide, clinging to what's left of our lives as the machines pick us off bit by bit.

But I choose a different path.

As of writing this, I have updated the build to be basically the same as what's on Steam, but later if I update the Steam version, this version might not be up to date.
